sheep.gui
Class TextButton

java.lang.Object
  sheep.gui.Widget
      sheep.gui.TextButton
All Implemented Interfaces:
KeyboardListener, TouchListener
public class TextButton
extends Widget

A TextButton is a simple borderless button which trigger WidgetEvents when clicked.
